mapper.select: select * from Member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, name, phone, postcode, address, detailAddress, extraAddress) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress})
mapper.update: update Member set password=#{password}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, postcode = #{postcode}, address = #{address}, extraAddress = #{extraAddress}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress} where id = #{id}
